responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "4B9B6AE347E5C02E26D2B3B76F7B6F74", "Aimed at lionhold, you say? We\'re aware that the Highwaymen have expanded their ambitions beyond brigandry, and this only confirms our suspicions that they have political motives as well. This is valuable information to consider when we enact our initiatives to narrow the breach between our factions. While some consider it out of the question to extend an offer of neutrality, this presents some key evidence to support diplomacy. We must reconsider our avenues of action.")
name: CSQ_0024_ReportonThornmarch_AmberDillard_DLG_34
